instructions: Open the Settings app. Tap your name. Tap Subscriptions. (If you don't see "Subscriptions," tap "iTunes & App Store" instead. Then tap your Apple ID, tap View Apple ID, sign in, scroll down to Subscriptions, and tap Subscriptions.) iPhone showing where you can find subscriptions in Settings. Tap the subscription that you want to manage. Don't see the subscription that you're looking for? Tap Cancel Subscription. If you don t see Cancel Subscription, the subscription is already canceled and won't renew.
